results.title: Development and evaluation of novel biodegradable chitosan based metformin intrapocket dental film for the management of periodontitis and alveolar bone loss in a rat model.
results.text_hl: Development and evaluation of novel biodegradable @CHEMICAL_Chitosan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D048271 @@@chitosan@@@ based @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ intrapocket dental film for the management of @DISEASE_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010518 @@@periodontitis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Alveolar_Bone_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016301 @@@alveolar bone loss@@@ in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model.

citations.NLM: Khajuria DK, Patil ON, Karasik D, Razdan R. Development and evaluation of novel biodegradable chitosan based metformin intrapocket dental film for the management of periodontitis and alveolar bone loss in a rat model. Arch Oral Biol. 2018 Jan;85():120-129. PMID: 29055230

results.title: The effect of metformin on alveolar bone in ligature-induced periodontitis in rats: a pilot study.
results.text_hl: The objective of this study was to assess the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Alveolar_Bone_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016301 @@@alveolar bone loss@@@ in ligature-induced @DISEASE_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010518 @@@periodontitis@@@ and osteoblast, osteoclast, and adipocyte differentiation.
